T02D1934:58a-3: mandala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1934:58a-4: mgon po 'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1934:58a-5: mandala bsdu na rnam gnyis te //
T02D1934:58a-6: yid kyis bsams dang dngos byed do //
T02D1934:58a-7: dngos la rnam pa bzhir gsungs te //
T02D1934:58a-8: slob dpon lhag pa'i lha nyid dang //
T02D1934:58a-9: mchod pa dang ni mdzes pa'o //
T02D1934:58a-10: rdo rje slob dpon mandala ni //
T02D1934:58a-11: cung zad bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D1934:58a-12: sa gzhi cha mnyam yid 'ong la //
T02D1934:58a-13: ba yi rnam lngas byug bya ste //
T02D1934:58a-14: gur gum la sogs dri yi chus //
T02D1934:58a-15: dus gsum dag tu byug par bya //
T02D1934:58a-17: rin chen mdzes pa'i 'bru nyid dam //
T02D1934:58a-18: me tog srog chags bral ba yis //
T02D1934:58a-19: rnam pa bco brgyad dgram bya ste //
T02D1934:58a-20: dang po 'og gi ri rab dang //
T02D1934:58a-21: rang gi phyogs nas brtsam bya ste ;
T02D1934:58a-22: / lus 'phags la sogs gling bzhi dang //
T02D1934:58a-23: dag pa g-yon gyi gling phran bzhi //
T02D1934:58a-24: bkram pa'i tshul gyis gsal bar bya //
T02D1934:58a-25: nang du de bzhin rin chen brgyad //
T02D1934:58a-26: gling brgyad bkang la dbul bar bya //
T02D1934:58a-27: de nas steng gi ri rab ni //
T02D1934:58a-28: gzhal yas gdan dang bcas bsams te //
T02D1934:58a-29: bla ma sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas //
T02D1934:58a-30: gus pas mandala dbul bar bya //
T02D1934:58a-31: aom a'a: h'um me ra be na ma:/
T02D1934:58a-32: aom ya purba bi de ha ye na ma:/
T02D1934:58a-33: aom ra dzambu dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58a-34: aom wa autta ra ku ra be na ma:/
T02D1934:58a-35: aom la aa pa ra go d'a n'i ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58a-36: aom ya au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58a-37: aom ra au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-0: aom wa au @58b pa dv'ai p'a ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-1: aom la au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-2: aom ya ga dza ratna ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-3: aom ra pu ru sha ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-4: aom la aa shva ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-5: aom wa str'i ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-6: aom khadga ratn'a ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-7: aom ra ma ni ratna ya na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-8: aom wa sarba ratn'a ni dhi bhyo na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-9: aom la tsa kra ratna dha ni bhyo na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-10: aom a'a: h'um dh'a ra be na ma:/
T02D1934:58b-11: bkod pa shin tu mdzes pa mandala mchog / bar ni rol mtsho phyi rol lcags ris bskor //
T02D1934:58b-12: dga' dang spros pas bcas pa'i mandala gang //
T02D1934:58b-13: de nyid sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni //
T02D1934:58b-14: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'dod pa blos //
T02D1934:58b-15: mi mthun phyogs rnams myur du zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1934:58b-16: brtson pa'i stobs kyis dus gsum dag tu ni //
T02D1934:58b-17: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin la dbul bar bya //
T02D1934:58b-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung 'dzin rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1934:58b-19: mnyes byed mandala bzang po 'di phul bas //
T02D1934:58b-20: mthong dang ma mthong nyes pa kun spangs te //
T02D1934:58b-21: thun mong mchog gi dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes //
T02D1934:58b-22: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bde mchog rgyud du bshad //
T02D1934:58b-23: de phyir 'bad pas mandala dbul bar bya //
T02D1934:58b-24: bdag gi mandala brtsams pa yis //
T02D1934:58b-25: dge ba gang thob de dag gis //
T02D1934:58b-26: 'gro kun bla ma bsten gyur cing //
T02D1934:58b-27: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob shog //
T02D1934:58b-30: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la rakshi tas /
T02D1934:58b-31: gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa la brten nas mandala gyi cho ga mdzad pa'o /
